name: Full Stack Development Environment (No K8s)

onCreateCommand.install-maven-11: curl --connect-timeout 30 --max-time 300 -fsSL https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.9.6/binaries/apache-maven-3.9.6-bin.tar.gz | sudo tar xz -C /opt && sudo ln -sf /opt/apache-maven-3.9.6/bin/mvn /usr/local/bin/mvn
onCreateCommand.install-java-11: sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-11-jdk && sudo update-alternatives --set java /usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java && sudo update-alternatives --set javac /usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/javac
onCreateCommand.setup-docker: sudo systemctl start docker || true && sudo usermod -aG docker $USER || true

postStartCommand: echo '🚀 웹 개발 환경 준비 완료!' && java -version && mvn -version && docker --version && http --version && docker-compose --version && if [ -d 'kafka' ]; then echo '📁 kafka 디렉토리 확인됨. 필요시 cd kafka && docker-compose up 실행하세요.'; else echo '⚠️ kafka 디렉토리를 찾을 수 없습니다.'; fi
